doc.after: The study of artificial neural networks 145 began in the decade before the field of AI research was founded in the work of Walter Pitts and Warren McCullough Other important early researchers were Frank Rosenblatt who invented the perceptron and Paul Werbos who developed the backpropagation algorithm 152
